title: I can't connect until everyone else loads into game, help?
body:
I get a network warning, and have to press reconnect a hundred times but it doesn't change a thing. i can only successfully reconnect when everyone has loaded and I always end up 20-40 seconds late- provided I time the reconnect right. if i'm solo queue its all a guessing game. one person was playing on a toaster on the enemy team, sat there pressing reconnect for 6 minutes. 

happened before but i thought maybe updating my graphics (nvidia geforce) fixed it, but the latest patch made it start again and updating my graphics did not fix it this time. what do? I've seen a few discussions on this but no one seems to have a solution.

replies.body:
Hey guys, there could be a lot of factors causing this issue.  Coming into the match late can happen if the game server puts you on idle for some reason.  This can happen if you have a third party program or firewall setting getting in the way.  See if auto-configuring firewall settings can help via our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Check your anti-virus as well to make sure it's allowing League as an exception, and definitely disable any mods you have running for League.

If these steps don't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further to see what's up.

Hey Porocles, and everyone else,
I think I resolved my problem: I had a third party program, indeed: Lan Killer (http://www.killernetworking.com/) supposed to manage my network... Well it is well named!
I uninstalled it, everything seems working now. I keep you in touch if the problem shows up once again.

Your specific issue sounds like a connection instability while reaching the game server.  Connecting after everyone loads in is strange, though I think it might be a coincidance of your network struggling to get in.  In this case, updating graphics drivers might not help with a network issue.  To help start off and rule out possibilities, run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Test it in a custom game though to prevent any penalties.

Hi Porocles, I have something here that might interest you:
I have been playing LoL in my new house since August. No problem so far (beetween 35 and 45 ping)
I changed my computer
Now I have this issue

The message says "you have been disconnected from the server, please check your internet blablabla" and appears on loading screen, after i finished loading the game (100%)
If I click on the message, I am unable to connect until everyone is in the game.

-> i added both client and game to firewall exceptions
-> if i don't click or anything, nothing happens

Any suggestion?

I've seen a few similar reports in this thread, but we haven't found anything out of the ordinary beyond what our normal connection guide can resolve.  If the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide hasn't helped, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further and see if something else is going on.

I get this same issue on occasion.  It doesn't happen every game but it does happen. So far the only theory I have is when you're loading in DO NOT CLICK or do anything. Just let the game load. If this doesn't work then I do not have any fix for you and you should submit a support ticket to see if they can do something about it.
